ns2:EnumDataTypeDefinition.ns1:desc: Shows if the failsafe function is activated or not. Multiple failsafe points is not possible, therefore this state is either idle or busy

ns2:member.name: active
ns2:member.ns2:desc: The resource is in use and it has sufficient spare operating capacity. Spare operating capacity to provide for additional users simultaneously. Defined by ITU-T X.731

ns2:member.name: busy
ns2:member.ns2:desc: The resource is in use, but it has no spare operating capacity. Spare operating capacity to provide for additional users at this instant. Defined by ITU-T X.731

ns2:member.name: idle
ns2:member.ns2:desc: The resource is not currently in use. Defined by ITU-T X.731
